item.title: Deploying R Model as API Web Service using Docker and Microsoft Azure
item.description: Objective 1 Our goal here is to create a R Model and put-in into production by deploying it as web service API using Docker to containerize (encapsulate) it and Microsoft Azure to host it. R Model To create the model, we going to use mtcars dataset which oneâ€™s is present inside R. head(mtcars) ## mpg cyl disp hp drat wt qsec vs am gear carb ## Mazda RX4 21.
